Suppose we have a dataframe df with 3 columns: user, item, rating
Use Cosine for the distance metric and Z-score to standardize values


User-based Collaborative Filtering
```{r}
rec.u <- Recommender(r, "UBCF", param=list(normalize="Z-score", method="Cosine"))
```

Item-based Collaborative Filtering
```{r}
rec.i <- Recommender(r, "IBCF", param=list(normalize="Z-score", method="Cosine"))
```
